title: Chantel Jeffries flaunts her cleavage in glittering sheer black gown at amfAR gala in Los Angeles
text:
Chantel Jeffries got all done up for her hot night on the town on Thursday evening.

The DJ, 27, appeared effortless while walking the purple carpet at the amFAR Gala in Los Angeles for The Foundation for AIDS Research.

She looked elegant as she worked the camera showing off all angles of her gorgeous gown and flawless figure.

Looking good: Chantel Jeffries looked elegant while walking the purple carpet at the amFAR Gala in Los Angeles

The black dress accentuated her chest and gave the appearance of leaves as they turned into thin straps up her shoulders.

As the pattern worked its way down her torso it turned into more black sheer lining that continued down to the ground.

She wore her hair in a high bun and had her bangs parted down the middle and curled at the ends.

Details: The black dress accentuated her chest and gave the appearance of leaves as they turned into thin straps up her shoulders

While she may be walking the carpet solo, it seems as though the social media influencer is in a relationship of her own.

Over the summer she was spotted leaving a party with Machine Gun Kelly wearing matching head-to-toe white outfits for the event.

The two have also been known to make sly references towards one another on their Instagram stories although they have yet to confirm nor deny the relationship.

Gorgeous: As the pattern worked its way down her torso it turned into more black sheer lining that continued down to the ground

Hair style: She wore her hair in a high bun and had her bangs parted down the middle and curled at the ends

Chantel's claim to fame was back in 2014 when she was riding in the car with Justin Bieber when he was pulled over and arrested in Miami for a DUI.

The two were linked on and off from 2014 to 2016 with neither of the two confirming the relationship.

Since then, she has gotten into the music and modeling industry and even had her song Wait make it to the top 10 on the Billboard charts.
description: Chantel Jeffries got all done up for her hot night on the town on Thursday evening. The DJ, 27, appeared effortless while walking the purple carpet at the amFAR Gala in Los Angeles.
